title: Rummi 6.0.35
description:
In this addictive Tile Rummy game, you play your tiles in groups
of three or more. Beat the computer, or play online with friends
or other Rummi fans. These are popular games of strategy,
combination and luck for 2-4 players, played worldwide with
cards or with tile sets like Rummikub. Several games included
with tiles and cards, or define your own games. Many options
like automatic hand sort, tutorial, hint, time limit, save and
resume.

Version 6.0.35 may include unspecified updates, enhancements, or
bug fixes.
